media.title: The Sound of Biodiversity
media.description: Interview discussing our work on acoustic monitoring and how AI can help us listen to ecosystems at scale.

media.title: AI in Ecological Assessment
media.description: Discussion on practical applications of machine learning for ecological consultants and conservation practitioners.

media.title: Camera Traps and Computer Vision
media.description: Deep dive into how deep learning is revolutionizing wildlife monitoring through automated camera trap analysis.

media.title: Tech for Nature: Machine Learning in Conservation
media.description: A 15-minute talk exploring the promise and challenges of applying AI to conservation problems.

media.title: AI and the Future of Conservation
media.description: Public lecture on how machine learning is transforming wildlife conservation, from automated species identification to predicting biodiversity loss.

media.title: AI for Biodiversity: Tools for the Climate Crisis
media.description: Presentation showcasing AI-powered monitoring solutions for tropical forest conservation in the Amazon region.

media.title: Conservation in the Age of AI
media.description: Panel discussion with leading conservation scientists and AI researchers on ethical considerations and future directions.

media.title: Technology and Wildlife Filmmaking
media.description: Panel exploring how AI and new sensing technologies are changing how we document and understand wildlife.

media.title: The Future of Field Ecology
media.description: Discussion on integrating traditional field methods with emerging AI technologies for conservation research.

media.title: Wildlife Monitoring with AI
media.description: Feature article about our camera trap AI system being deployed in national parks across the UK.

media.title: Listening to the Rainforest
media.description: Interview on acoustic monitoring projects in tropical forests and the challenges of deploying AI in remote locations.

media.title: From Data to Conservation Action
media.description: Profile piece discussing the journey from academic research to real-world conservation impact.
